item.description:
Folks, in honor of the book the Kite Runner I thought it might be good for us to experience Afghan food. There are a lot of references to it in the book so here we go. Feel free to invite friends and family to this Afghan feast. I have been to this restaurant a few times. The food is quite good. Please RSVP either way a week prior. I will call them and make reservations a week before this dinner.

Each person is responsible for the price of their own dinner.
item.name: Celebrate the Kite Runner!
